alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 4:14PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SONOMA AND NORTHWESTERN NAPA COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM PST... At 414 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from St. Helena to 12 miles west of Sebastopol. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Windsor, Healdsburg, Cloverdale, Sebastopol, St. Helena, Calistoga, Roseland, Larkfield-Wikiup, South Santa Rosa Cdp, Forestville, Guerneville, Graton, Monte Rio, Occidental, Angwin, and Deer Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range
